meanings.sent1: The princess wore the ritziest gown to the ball.
meanings.sent2: Their ritziest car was the envy of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The ritziest cat in town only ate imported caviar.
meanings.sent4: Her ritziest dreams were filled with silk and diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The ritziest hotel in the city had gold-plated elevators.

meanings.definition: The most luxurious or stylish in a group
meanings.sent1: Among the cars, his was the ritziest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The ritziest of the dresses caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the ritziest guest arrived in a limousine made of gold.
meanings.sent4: In the competition, her ritziest creation won the top prize.
meanings.sent5: The ritziest house on the block had a swimming pool and a private cinema.
